alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 7:02AM AKDT until March 17 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY FOR THE SOUTHERN AND WESTERN COPPER RIVER BASIN... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches with locally higher amounts along the Richardson Highway south of the Edgerton Highway Junction. * WHERE...Copper River Basin south and west of Glennallen. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of moderate snow that developed overnight will continue through Friday morning. 4 to 6 inches of snow have already fallen across the Edgerton Hwy and Richardson Hwy south of the Edgerton Hwy junction. Areas of moderate snow with several inches of accumulation are also impacting the Glenn Highway west of Glennallen, especially around Eureka. Snow will continue to fall through this morning across these locations before tapering off by early afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
